sentences.en: ...a new two-year course leading to a diploma in social work.
sentences.cn: ...一门可以获得社会工作文凭的2年制的新课程。

sentences.en: A diploma is no guarantee of efficiency.
sentences.cn: 持有文凭不能保证工作效率一定高.

sentences.en: a new two-year course leading to a diploma in social work.
sentences.cn: ...一门可以获得社会工作文凭的2年制的新课程。

sentences.en: Diploma and certificate courses do not normally require the submission of a dissertation.
sentences.cn: 为获得文凭和证书所修的课程通常不需要提交论文。

sentences.en: Finding himself pressured on both sides, Fang Hung - chien finally realized the importance of a foreign diploma.
sentences.cn: 方鸿 渐 受到两面夹攻,才知道留学文凭的重要.
他把大学文凭加上了镜框.

sentences.en: I’m hoping to get my teaching diploma this year.
sentences.cn: 我希望今年能拿到教师证书。

sentences.en: Miss Sun had brought her diploma, but that was useless.
sentences.cn: 孙小姐带着她的毕业文凭那全无用处.

sentences.en: Now, this ninth - grade diploma isn't going to help me much in life.
sentences.cn: 眼下, 这个九年级的毕业文凭在我的生活中不会有多大帮助的.

sentences.en: Only 18.8% of the class of 1982 had some kind of diploma four years after high school, versus 45% of the class of 1972.
sentences.cn: 1982年那一届只有18.8%的学生在中学毕业4年后获得了某种文凭，而1972年那一届这一比例是45％。

sentences.en: Only then is a diploma issued by the Ministry of Higher Education.
sentences.cn: 只有在那时高教部才签发学位证书.

sentences.en: She gained a diploma in Business Administration.
sentences.cn: 她取得了工商管理的学位证书.

sentences.en: She worked hard to earn her music diploma.
sentences.cn: 她刻苦用功,以求获得音乐学位证书.

sentences.en: The council's peaceprize was given to him and along with it a diploma.
sentences.cn: 委员会向他颁发了和平奖并附有一张奖状.

sentences.en: The course leads to a diploma in psychiatric nursing.
sentences.cn: 读完这门课程可以获得精神病护理文凭.

sentences.en: The paper which the student receives in high school is a diploma.
sentences.cn: 中学生得到的证书叫文凭.

sentences.en: The university may revoke my diploma.
sentences.cn: 大学可能吊销我的毕业证书.

words.tran_cn: 经考试或审查合格的专科医生；学位证书持有者

phrases.tran_cn: 大学文凭；（高等学校）文凭、毕业证书
[美口]文凭制造工厂；野鸡大学；不入流学校
研究生文凭；研究生文凭课程

trans.tran_en: a document showing that someone has successfully completed a course of study or passed an examination
